name: Citadale - Book of Shadows
description:
Your phone is haunted!

After his victory over Rhogul, lord of darkness, young Christopher Dorleac learns about the missing pages of the Book of Shadows, the artifact Rhogul used against him during their final confrontation. Determined to find and destroy the pages before they fall into the wrong hands, Christopher returns to Citadale Island once more...

- Five long stages filled with monsters and bosses
- Generous checkpoints automatically save your progress
- Designed to be played with the touch screen
- The full retrogaming experience on the go
- The 16bit visual and sound design scream nostalgia
- Translated into six languages
